name: Colour's Missing? Yikes!
description:
This game was made for CMPUT 250 at the University of Alberta!

The team:

Aaron Tripodi - Lead Designer/Programmer

Mackenzie Whittington - Producer/Artist

Kendall Leighton - Composer

Cody Scmidt - Writer

Monica Bui - Programmer

Mehrab Meidi - Prgrammer

This game won awards at the University for excellence in  technical achievement, and  excellence in writing and story.
